methods.name: public Builder setMediaSize(@NonNull MediaSize mediaSize)
methods.comment:
* Sets the media size.
         *
         * @param mediaSize The media size.
         * @return This builder.

methods.name: public Builder setResolution(@NonNull Resolution resolution)
methods.comment:
* Sets the resolution.
         *
         * @param resolution The resolution.
         * @return This builder.

methods.name: public Builder setMinMargins(@NonNull Margins margins)
methods.comment:
* Sets the minimal margins. If the content does not fit
         * these margins it will be clipped.
         *
         * @param margins The margins.
         * @return This builder.

methods.name: public Builder setColorMode(@ColorMode int colorMode)
methods.comment:
* Sets the color mode.
         *
         * @param colorMode A valid color mode or zero.
         * @return This builder.
         *
         * @see PrintAttributes#COLOR_MODE_MONOCHROME
         * @see PrintAttributes#COLOR_MODE_COLOR

methods.name: public Builder setDuplexMode(@DuplexMode int duplexMode)
methods.comment:
* Sets the duplex mode.
         *
         * @param duplexMode A valid duplex mode or zero.
         * @return This builder.
         *
         * @see PrintAttributes#DUPLEX_MODE_NONE
         * @see PrintAttributes#DUPLEX_MODE_LONG_EDGE
         * @see PrintAttributes#DUPLEX_MODE_SHORT_EDGE

methods.name: public PrintAttributes build()
methods.comment:
* Creates a new {@link PrintAttributes} instance.
         *
         * @return The new instance.
